SEARCH
Package golden.raspberry.awards.infrastructure.adapter.driven.xml

Class XmlIdKeyManagerAdapter

java.lang.Object
golden.raspberry.awards.infrastructure.adapter.driven.xml.XmlIdKeyManagerAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IdKeyManagerPort
@Component public class XmlIdKeyManagerAdapter extends Object implements IdKeyManagerPort
Output Adapter for managing ID keys in XML file. Implements IdKeyManagerPort and handles XML file operations.

XML structure: 

 
 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
 <keys>
     <lastId>206</lastId>
 </keys>
Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Luiz Generoso

  • Method Details

    • getLastId

      public Optional<Long> getLastId()
      Gets the last used ID from XML file.
      Specified by:
      getLastId in interface IdKeyManagerPort
      Returns:
      Optional containing the last used ID, or empty if file doesn't exist or is invalid

    • updateLastId

      public void updateLastId(Long lastId)
      Updates the last used ID in XML file.
      Specified by:
      updateLastId in interface IdKeyManagerPort
      Parameters:
      lastId - Last used ID to update
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if lastId is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if lastId is negative
      IllegalStateException - if XML file cannot be created or updated

    • synchronizeWithDatabase

      public void synchronizeWithDatabase(Long maxIdFromDatabase)
      Synchronizes the last ID with the database maximum ID. If XML key is less than database max ID, updates XML to database max ID. If XML key is greater than or equal to database max ID, keeps XML value.
      Specified by:
      synchronizeWithDatabase in interface IdKeyManagerPort
      Parameters:
      maxIdFromDatabase - Maximum ID from database
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if maxIdFromDatabase is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if maxIdFromDatabase is negative

    • resetLastId

      public void resetLastId(Long resetValue)
      Resets the last ID to a specific value.
      Specified by:
      resetLastId in interface IdKeyManagerPort
      Parameters:
      resetValue - Value to reset the last ID to
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if resetValue is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if resetValue is negative
      IllegalStateException - if XML file cannot be updated

    • getNextId

      public Long getNextId()
      Gets the next available ID and updates the XML file.
      Specified by:
      getNextId in interface IdKeyManagerPort
      Returns:
      Next available ID
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if XML file cannot be read or updated
